description: Today we get to see the softer side of Jake Andrews. We all know that he's a sexy son of a bitch who loves to have sex: this is a gorgeous guy who has a passion for men, and when he shows his attention no one denies it. He's amazing at having sex, and that's all there is to it. But here Jake Andrews has a make-out session with Michael Lucas where they embrace and kiss on a sofa.
title: Jake Andrews Explores His Romantic Side with Michael Lucas
